page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content:
The Domesday surveys were conducted by the third year pupils of Pinvin Middle school under the guidance of Mr.Philip.S.King. The text pages were researched and written by the following children:
Sarah Amery, Vikki Powell, Cheryl Foster, Yvonne McGonigle, Stephanie Jackson, Michelle Lacy, Scott Powell, Sharon Jones, Helen Pinfield, Melissa Lloyd, Kevin Blackney, Dafydd Wase, Abigail Smith, Tamzin Johnson and Rebecca Izod.
By the time the Domesday discs are published these children will be attending Pershore High School. Thank you for your hard work and good luck in the future.
